definitions.definition: A substance or solution used to repel insects , dangerous animals, or other pests .
examples: None of the mosquito repellents we've tried work.

definitions.definition: A substance or treatment for a fabric etc to make it impervious to something.
examples: They applied dirt repellent to the sports car.

main_definition: A substance or solution used to repel insects , dangerous animals, or other pests .
secondary_definitions: A substance or treatment for a fabric etc to make it impervious to something.
( obsolete , more generally ) Someone or something that repels.
